headline: LEITZ BRIGHTFIELD/DARKFIELD FILAR EYEPIECE
description: Brightfield, Darkfield and DIC Leitz Filar Eyepiece with Boeckeler Micrometer and Readout
keywords: metallograph scope dic brightfield darkfield polarizer compound metallurgical
specstable:
Manufacturer Leitz
Model Laborlux 12 HL
Microscope Configuration Brightfield, Darkfield & DIC
Illumination Type Reflected & Transmitted Light
Binocular Angle 45°
Eyepieces
Magnification 12 X
Trinocular/Phototube Provided YES
Magnification Changer None
Multiple Objectives Models

NPL 5X 0.09
NPL 10x, 0.25, with ICR 10X 0.20P prism
NPL 20x, 0.35 DF
NPL Fluotar 50X, 0.85, with ICR 50x 0.85P prism
NPL Fluotar 100x, 0.90 DF

Infinity Corrected Objectives YES
Polarizer YES
Analyzer YES
Condenser YES
Illumination Power Volts: 6 Watts: 20
Illumination Power Transmitted Volts: 6 Watts: 20
Stage Type Coaxial X-Y
Stage Area Length: 292 mm (11.496 in) Width: 165.0 mm (6.496 in)
X-Y-Z Stage Travel X: 108 mm (4.252 in) Y : 108 mm (4.252 in)
Camera
Type None
Accessories

ICR Analyzer
Leitz Condenser, P/N: 513547
External reflected light power supply
Internal transmitted light power supply

Other Information

Boeckeler Microcode II readout.
Leitz P/N: 883901 Filar

NB:

  • Brightfield only in 10x and 50x objectives
  • Brighfield and darkfield in 5x, 20x, and 100x objectives
Power Requirements 100-240 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
